org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avfilter

Class AVFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avfilter.AVFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Properties(inherit=avfilter.class)
public class AVFilter
extends Pointer
    Filter definition. This defines the pads a filter contains, and all the callback functions used to interact with the filter.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AVFilter.Activate_AVFilterContext
      Filter activation function.
      static class  AVFilter.Init_AVFilterContext
      Filter initialization function.
      static class  AVFilter.Preinit_AVFilterContext
      Filter pre-initialization function This callback will be called immediately after the filter context is allocated, to allow allocating and initing sub-objects.
      static class  AVFilter.Process_command_AVFilterContext_BytePointer_BytePointer_BytePointer_int_int
      Make the filter instance process a command.
      static class  AVFilter.Query_func_AVFilterContext
      Query formats supported by the filter on its inputs and outputs.
      static class  AVFilter.Query_func2_AVFilterContext_PointerPointer_PointerPointer
      Same as query_func(), except this function writes the results into provided arrays.
      static class  AVFilter.Uninit_AVFilterContext
      Filter uninitialization function.

        public AVFilter description(BytePointer setter)

      • inputs

        @Const
public AVFilterPad inputs()
        List of static inputs. NULL if there are no (static) inputs. Instances of filters with AVFILTER_FLAG_DYNAMIC_INPUTS set may have more inputs than present in this list.

      • inputs

        public AVFilter inputs(AVFilterPad setter)

      • outputs

        @Const
public AVFilterPad outputs()
        List of static outputs. NULL if there are no (static) outputs. Instances of filters with AVFILTER_FLAG_DYNAMIC_OUTPUTS set may have more outputs than present in this list.

      • outputs

        public AVFilter outputs(AVFilterPad setter)

      • priv_class

        @Const
public AVClass priv_class()
        A class for the private data, used to declare filter private AVOptions. This field is NULL for filters that do not declare any options. If this field is non-NULL, the first member of the filter private data must be a pointer to AVClass, which will be set by libavfilter generic code to this class.

      • priv_class

        public AVFilter priv_class(AVClass setter)

      • formats_pixels_list

        @Name(value="formats.pixels_list")
 @Cast(value="const AVPixelFormat*")
public IntPointer formats_pixels_list()
        A pointer to an array of admissible pixel formats delimited by AV_PIX_FMT_NONE. The generic code will use this list to indicate that this filter supports each of these pixel formats, provided that all inputs and outputs use the same pixel format. In addition to that the generic code will mark all inputs and all outputs as supporting all color spaces and ranges, as long as all inputs and outputs use the same color space/range. This list must never be NULL if the union is in this state. The type of all inputs and outputs of filters using this must be AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO.

      • formats_pixels_list

        public AVFilter formats_pixels_list(IntPointer setter)

      • formats_samples_list

        @Name(value="formats.samples_list")
 @Cast(value="const AVSampleFormat*")
public IntPointer formats_samples_list()
        Analogous to pixels, but delimited by AV_SAMPLE_FMT_NONE and restricted to filters that only have AVMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO inputs and outputs. In addition to that the generic code will mark all inputs and all outputs as supporting all sample rates and every channel count and channel layout, as long as all inputs and outputs use the same sample rate and channel count/layout.

      • formats_samples_list

        public AVFilter formats_samples_list(IntPointer setter)

      • formats_pix_fmt

        @Name(value="formats.pix_fmt")
 @Cast(value="AVPixelFormat")
public int formats_pix_fmt()
        Equivalent to { pix_fmt, AV_PIX_FMT_NONE } as pixels_list.

      • formats_pix_fmt

        public AVFilter formats_pix_fmt(int setter)

      • formats_sample_fmt

        @Name(value="formats.sample_fmt")
 @Cast(value="AVSampleFormat")
public int formats_sample_fmt()
        Equivalent to { sample_fmt, AV_SAMPLE_FMT_NONE } as samples_list.

      • formats_sample_fmt
